mapper.sql: id, resource_id, name, url, open_mode, description, icon, pid, seq, status, resource_type, gmt_create, gmt_modify, creator, modifier, is_del
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from auth_resource
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into auth_resource (id, resource_id, name, url, open_mode, description, icon, pid, seq, status, resource_type, gmt_create, gmt_modify, creator, modifier, is_del ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seq,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT} )

insert into auth_resource
id,
resource_id,
name,
url,
open_mode,
description,
icon,
pid,
seq,
status,
resource_type,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
creator,
modifier,
is_del,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update auth_resource
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
resource_id = #{record.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_mode = #{record.openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
seq = #{record.seq,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
resource_type = #{record.resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=BIT},

update auth_resource set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, resource_id = #{record.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_mode = #{record.openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seq = #{record.seq,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, resource_type = #{record.resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=BIT}

update auth_resource
resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_mode = #{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update auth_resource set resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_mode = #{openMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
